page.title: 09MY MUMMY IS A NURSE
page.content:
Mummy is a nurse. She baths people who are not well and changes their beds and gives them their meals. She gives sick patients medicine and helps the doctors to operate on them if they need an operation. If Mummy is looking after sick children she has to make sure their mummies and daddies know what is happening to their little boys and girls. Everything is explained to them. She makes sure all patients are happy and when they come out of hospital the district nurse visits them. I am pleased when I tell all my friends at school that my mummy is a nurse.
{Melanie Dickinson Age 8
